name: Hope (itch) (satanas82, Azrael Arocha)
description:
Log #1137 for 2157-11-03  From: Satoshi Nekoseo  To: Agatha Hope 

Agatha, 

Reports show that it's too late. We can't afford to miss this opportunity. It's time to execute the Titan Mission. Our intel revealed the existence of an Interstellar Ship Prototype in NexxusCorp's lunar base. Your mission, should you choose to accept it, is to steal it and establish the first settlement on Proxima B. You can't won't do it alone. 

Meet your team: 

Robert Rodriguez (36), master strategist and muscle | Success Rate: 100%; 

Donny Backman (31), our eyes and ear inside NexxusCorp and code whiperer | Aeros' guardian; 

Sabah Dagher (37), I don't have to tell you about your best friend; and 

Mariko Nishimura (30), Terrafomist Expert and NexusCorp employee. She may be a liability. You'll need to... persuade her to cooperate. 

I know you'd like the world to have a chance, but NexxusCorp's gone too far. I trust you, Agatha, If anyone can do this is this crew.

--------------

--------------

What is Hope?

Hope is a sci-fi point-and-click adventure with an emphasis on mini-games that takes place in a future where humanity is testing tools for interstellar travel but also destroying Earth’s ecosystem, pushing the human race to the verge of extinction. 

Your sole purpose, as the ship’s Captain, is to guarantee the success of the Titan Mission, at any cost.

Explore, solve puzzles and interact with mini-games to discover the story behind Agatha Hope and her crew. Overcome all the adversities and be the Captain you want to be by making the best decisions for you, your crew and the rest of humanity.

Who are we? 

We are three friends wanting to tell a story. 

Wil (@satanas882): Lord of Code and accolade of the lowest on high

Juan (@amante_records): Master of Sounds and teller of fortunes

Azrael (@azraelccs): Slave of words and designer of problems

We are excited to finally give you a taste of Hope and for you to meet the crew.
